com.versionone.integration.ciCommon

Interface BuildInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HudsonBuildInfo

    public interface BuildInfo
    This interface provides information about build to Worker.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBuildId()
      This ID is written to the reference field of the BuildRun.
      String getBuildName() 
      Iterable<VcsModification> getChanges()
      Gets list of VCS changes included in the build.
      long getElapsedTime()
      ElapsedTime is used for setting BuildRun elapsed time.
      String getProjectName()
      Project name is used for finding corresponding BuildProject.
      Date getStartTime()
      StartTime is set as BuildRun creation time.
      String getUrl() 
      boolean hasChanges()
      Check whether build have any VCS changes.
      boolean isForced()
      Defines whether build was manualy forced.
      boolean isSuccessful()
      Defines success of build.

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectName

        String getProjectName()
        Project name is used for finding corresponding BuildProject.
        Returns:
        name of Project witch was build.

      • getBuildId

        long getBuildId()
        This ID is written to the reference field of the BuildRun.
        Returns:
        build ID.

      • getStartTime

        Date getStartTime()
        StartTime is set as BuildRun creation time.
        Returns:
        start time.

      • getElapsedTime

        long getElapsedTime()
        ElapsedTime is used for setting BuildRun elapsed time.
        Returns:
        building time in milliseconds.

      • isSuccessful

        boolean isSuccessful()
        Defines success of build.
        Returns:
        true if build is successful; otherwise - false.

      • isForced

        boolean isForced()
        Defines whether build was manualy forced.
        Returns:
        true if build was forced; otherwise - false.

      • hasChanges

        boolean hasChanges()
        Check whether build have any VCS changes.
        Returns:

      • getChanges

        Iterable<VcsModification> getChanges()
        Gets list of VCS changes included in the build.
        Returns:
        Iterable of VCS changes.

      • getUrl

        String getUrl()
        Returns:
        url of build results web page.

      • getBuildName

        String getBuildName()
        Returns:
        name of build. (may be equals to getBuildId())
